name: Little Learners
description: Participants will explore art, movement and circle time. 2-3 year olds accompanied by caregiver, 4-5 years old may be dropped off, if potty trained.
fullDescription: Participants will explore art, movement and circle time. 2-3 year olds accompanied by caregiver, 4-5 years old may be dropped off, if potty trained.
whatTheyOffer: Participants will explore art, movement and circle time. 2-3 year olds accompanied by caregiver, 4-5 years old may be dropped off, if potty trained.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
address: 301 Naglee St @ Cayuga St, San Francisco, CA, 94112
